content.rendered:
ULTIMATE CCTV SOLUTIONS

We customize CCTV Security - Perfectly Tailored to Your Needs

Shop Now

Why choose us

5 Years of Excellence with Security Systems Service

We are the proven experts in total property security – providing smoothly integrated systems blending state-of-the-art surveillance equipment with fortified access management. Our experienced team custom-tailors layered physical protections and 24/7 virtual monitoring to safeguard assets and provide alerts and actionable intelligence. 

Get Quote

What you get

Expert consultation to determine security needs and customize integrated solutions

Real-time monitoring for rapid response to incidents

Industry-leading hardware with high resolution footage and durability

Skilled installation for clean, unobtrusive system placement and full coverage

Intuitive software and interfaces for easy monitoring and control

Ongoing maintenance & optimization for evolving security demands

Top Selling

View Store
Add to cart

3.8telescopic ladder

KSh25,000.00 KSh22,499.00 Tax exclusive
Add to cart

3.8M alluminium telescopic ladder

KSh21,000.00 KSh19,499.00 Tax exclusive
Add to cart

Sherlotronics 4 Channel Receiver 500m Range RX4-500

KSh10,500.00 KSh8,999.00 Tax exclusive
Add to cart

Suprema bioEntry p2

KSh75,000.00 KSh71,999.00 Tax exclusive

OUR SERVICES

Automatic gate Installation

We install modern automated gates secured by cameras for controlled access – integrating seamless entry with surveillance to manage traffic flow while monitoring activity, keeping your facility and occupants safe around-the-clock

Access Control Installation

.Our integrated access control systems provide customized security for your facilities - tightly managing and monitoring authorized access with auditable trails and alerts to provide complete visibility, protection, and peace of mind

Fence Installation

We combines expert fence installation with integrated surveillance for superior perimeter defense – flexible customized solutions maximizing protection, fortification and real-time monitoring for your property.

CCTV Installation

Our CCTV solutions provide customized coverage blending cutting-edge technology with expert installation for seamless property monitoring - delivering crystal clear security footage and intuitive interfaces to keep your building protected 24/7

Let's Discuss Your Unique Security Needs

Book a service
